metadata.name: Ripple Effect
metadata.description:
This A.I. generative art piece titled "Ripple Effect" invites the viewer to reflect upon the intricate and interconnected nature of life.

Through the movement of dots, the artwork depicts the ripple effect - a phenomenon in which an initial event can have far-reaching and unexpected consequences. By contemplating the subtle shifts and movements of the dots, the viewer is invited to consider the ways in which their own actions can influence the world around them, and to recognize the importance of interconnectedness and interdependence in our lives. 

Ultimately,  â€œRipple Effect" offers a contemplative and thought-provoking meditation on the complex web of life in which we are all entangled.

Generative art created using JavaScript code and the p5.js library with a combination of A.I. tools and Adobe Premiere Pro.
